info.title: Eval Hub
info.description: API REST server for evaluation backend orchestration on OpenShift

post.description: Run an evaluation on a single benchmark (Llama Stack compatible API).

get.description: Get the status of an evaluation request.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of evaluations to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of evaluations to return

schema.title: Response List Evaluations Api V1 Evaluations Jobs Get

get.description: Get a summary of an evaluation request.

schema.title: Response Get Evaluation Summary Api V1 Evaluations Jobs  Id  Summary Get
Response Get System Metrics Api V1 Metrics System Get

get.description: Get details of a specific provider.
List all available benchmarks across providers (similar to Llama Stack format).
List benchmarks for a specific provider.

schema.title: Response List Provider Benchmarks Api V1 Providers  Provider Id  Benchmarks Get

get.description: Get details of a specific benchmark.
Get details of a specific collection.

schema.title: Response Reload Providers Api V1 Providers Reload Post

get.description: List all registered and runtime model servers.
Get details of a specific model server.

put.description: Update an existing registered model server.

get.description: List all models across all servers.

post.description: Reload runtime models from environment variables.
Reload runtime model servers from environment variables.

schema.title: Response Reload Runtime Servers Api V1 Servers Reload Post

post.description: Receive evaluation results from completed evaluation jobs via HTTP callback.

schema.title: Response Receive Evaluation Results Api V1 Api V1 Evaluation Results Post
